name: Skeleton Raid (Beta)
description:
Skeleton Raid is a FPS parkour game where you have to destroy skeletons. You are in a facility and people who are working there are turning into skeletons you have to escape that facility but there are obstacles. This is a First Person Shooter parkour. Have fun!!! Note: (This game is still in it's beta)

Created by CaptPonsoStudio :)
